head.title: World Business Briefing | Americas: Argentina: Inflation Surges

hedline.hl1: World Business Briefing | Americas: Argentina: Inflation Surges

abstract.p: Argentina's benchmark consumer price index rose larger-than-expected 1.5 percent in March; inflation has already risen 4 percent this year and 8.8 percent in last 12 months, well ahead of government's year-end target of 5 percent to 8 percent (S)

block.p: Argentina's benchmark consumer price index rose a larger-than-expected 1.5 percent in March, adding to concerns that inflation may be spiraling out of control at a time when the government is waging a campaign to persuade companies to control prices. With the March figure, inflation has already risen 4 percent this year and 8.8 percent in the last 12 months, well ahead of the government's year-end target of 5 percent to 8 percent.
